name: ASFY
description:
ASFY is a little original game I started to develop a while ago, with only one thing in mind: a meme

Yes, the whole concept for ASFY came from a silly image of the word"friend" in Russian "друг". I don't know, it gives me some spooky vibes, so I decided to make a 2d game with monsters like that one.

So the game has 3 sections with 3 levels each, a tiny horror game with a simple story, simple characters, and a couple of easter eggs.

Follow Cassian, a retired engineer that thinks he can solve the mystery behind the purple portals that led the strange monsters to our world. And the acronym ASFY.

MZ Games 2023
